content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)

### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory structure found

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5) and a chest at position(x=0.5, y=2.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the pipe connection exists before attempting to connect entities
- Make sure the pipe is connected to the correct entity and position

### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure that the burner mining drill has fuel before attempting to mine
- Make sure the burner mining drill is placed correctly and has a clear path to the resource

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure that the boiler has fuel before attempting to use it
- Make sure the boiler is connected to a pipe and has a clear path to the steam engine

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure that the steam engine has a fluid input before attempting to use it
- Make sure the steam engine is connected to a boiler and has a clear path to the electricity generator
